price: Iblīs said, “My Lord, then grant me respite until the Day they are resurrected.”
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
